alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Floyd; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:32PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Floyd, north central Polk and southwestern Bartow Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1232 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Taylorsville, or 11 miles southeast of Rome, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Euharlee, Aragon and Taylorsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
